headline.print_headline: Lawmaker: Marijuana Needs Debate in New Mexico
headline.main: Lawmaker: Marijuana Needs Debate in New Mexico

docs.lead_paragraph: The conversation about whether New Mexico should join other Western states in legalizing marijuana is cranking up as state lawmakers prepare for the 2015 legislative session.
docs.snippet: The conversation about whether New Mexico should join other Western states in legalizing marijuana is cranking up as state lawmakers prepare for the 2015 legislative session.
